SEARCH

Class Champion

java.lang.Object
Champion
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdvancedTrainingDummy, TrainingDummy
public abstract class Champion extends Object
A Champion is a player's character in the game. Each Champion has a name, health, attack power, and defense power.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Champion(String name, int attackPower, int defensePower, int maxHealth)
    Create a Champion with the given stats.

  • Constructor Details

    • Champion

      public Champion(String name, int attackPower, int defensePower, int maxHealth)
      Create a Champion with the given stats. The champion's maxHealth can be at most 100. The Champion's attackPower and defensePower must add up to at most MAX_STAT_TOTAL (10).
      Parameters:
      name - The Champion's name
      attackPower - The Champion's attack power
      defensePower - The Champion's defense power
      maxHealth - The Champion's maximum health

  • Method Details

    • getActions

      public List<Action> getActions()
      Get the list of actions that this Champion can perform.
      Returns:
      The list of actions that this Champion can perform.

    • lockInAction

      public void lockInAction(Action action)
      Set the action that this Champion has locked in to perform this turn or charge for a future turn. If an action is already locked in, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to lock in

    • getLockedInAction

      public Action getLockedInAction()
      Get the action that this Champion has locked in to perform this turn or charge for a future turn.
      Returns:
      The action that this Champion has locked in to perform this turn or is charging for a future turn.

    • takeDamage

      public final int takeDamage(int baseDamage, BattleContext context)
      Apply damage to the Champion's health. The damage is modified by the wielder's attack power and the enemy's defense power, and then modified by any active modifiers. The damage is clamped to be between 1 and 25.
      Parameters:
      baseDamage - The base damage to apply
      context - The context of the battle, including the weilder of the attack and enemy the attack is against
      Returns:
      The actual amount of damage applied

    • heal

      public int heal(int baseAmount, BattleContext context)
      Apply healing to the Champion's health. The healing is modified by any active modifiers. The healing is clamped to be between 1 and the amount needed to reach maxHealth.
      Parameters:
      baseAmount - The base amount of healing to apply
      context - The context of the battle
      Returns:
      The actual amount of healing applied

    • rawDamage

      public int rawDamage(int amount, BattleContext context)
      This method is used to apply damage directly to the champion's health. It is not affected by any modifiers and should be used with caution - likely just for status effects.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of damage to apply
      context - The context of the battle
      Returns:
      The actual amount of damage applied

    • isAlive

      public final boolean isAlive()
      Check if the Champion is alive.
      Returns:
      true if the Champion is alive (currentHealth > 0)

    • isCharging

      public boolean isCharging()
      Check if the Champion is currently charging an action.
      Returns:
      true if the Champion is currently charging an action

    • startCharging

      public void startCharging()
      Start charging the action that is currently locked in. If the action is not chargeable, this method does nothing.

    • advanceCharge

      public Action advanceCharge()
      Advance the charge for the action that is currently locked in. If the action is not chargeable, or is done charging, the action is returned and the champion no longer has a locked in action.
      Returns:
      A null action that indicates the champion is charging up an action.

    • getChargeTurnsRemaining

      public int getChargeTurnsRemaining()
      Get the number of turns remaining until the selected action is charged.
      Returns:
      The number of turns remaining until the charge is complete

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get the Champion's name
      Returns:
      The Champion's name

    • getMaxHealth

      public int getMaxHealth()
      Get the Champion's maximum health
      Returns:
      The Champion's maximum health

    • getCurrentHealth

      public int getCurrentHealth()
      Get the Champion's current health
      Returns:
      The Champion's current health

    • getAttackPower

      public int getAttackPower()
      Get the champion's current attack power.
      Returns:
      The Champion's attack power

    • getDefensePower

      public int getDefensePower()
      Get the Champion's defense power
      Returns:
      The Champion's defense power

    • getLoadout

      public Loadout getLoadout()
      Get the Champion's loadout - the items that are currently in play
      Returns:
      The Champion's loadout

    • getArsenal

      public Arsenal getArsenal()
      Get the Champion's arsenal - the items that can be swapped in and out of the loadout
      Returns:
      The Champion's arsenal
